suite.name: Post Auth

kw.name: Dado que o usuário submeteu suas credenciais de acesso:
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Quanto eu faço uma requisição POST para o serviço / auth
Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=api, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Post Request
kw.doc: Send a POST request on the session object found using the given `alias`
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/auth path_url=/auth headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.23.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '58', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "antonioaguiar@gmail.com", "password": "hahaha"}'

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Então o código de status deve ser
Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: E a mensagem na resposta igual a
Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

suite.doc: Sendo um APP cliente (mobile, web) que recebeu os dados do usuário Quero solicitar requisições POST para o serviço /auth Para que o sistema possa avaliar se o usuário possui acesso.
